Text: This RoB (PR3DATOR) release is full of fail. Video: Black bars intact (waste of bitrate), ridiculously high bitrate (waste of file size). Audio: Ridiculously low bitrate (5.1 AC3 at 53 Kbps p/ch!? High, even mid freq cut off.). Also: Waste of MKV container. Pretty horrible, amateur (SD, 480p, non-720p) release all-around.
